title: Vector Product of Vectors Quiz
description: Test your understanding of cross products, their properties, and geometric applications.

questions.question: What is the cross product of (1, 2, 3) and (4, 5, 6)?
Which property does the cross product NOT satisfy?
questions.explanation: The cross product is not associative: (a×b)×c ≠ a×(b×c)

questions.question: What does |a × b| represent geometrically?
options: Area of parallelogram formed by a and b
questions.explanation: The magnitude of the cross product gives the area of the parallelogram formed by the two vectors.

questions.question: When is a × b = 0?
questions.explanation: The cross product is zero when vectors are parallel (collinear).
